speaker: SHUTTLE CAPTAIN
combinedline: Command station, this is ST 321. Code Clearance Blue. We're starting our approach. Deactivate the security shield.

speaker: DEATH STAR CONTROLLER
combinedline: The security deflector shield will be deactivated when we have confirmation of your code transmission. Stand by... You are clear to proceed.

speaker: SHUTTLE CAPTAIN
combinedline: We're starting our approach.

speaker: OFFICER
combinedline: Inform the commander that Lord Vader's shuttle has arrived.

speaker: OPERATOR
combinedline: Sir.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: Lord Vader, this is an unexpected pleasure. We're honored by your presence.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I'm here to put you back on schedule.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: I assure you, Lord Vader, my men are working as fast as they can.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Perhaps I can find new ways to motivate them.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: I tell you, this station will be operational as planned.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: The emperor does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: But he asks the impossible. I need more men.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Then perhaps you can tell him when he arrives.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: The emperor's coming here?

speaker: VADER
combinedline: That is correct, Commander. And he is most displeased with your apparent lack of progress.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: We shall double our efforts.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: I hope so, Commander, for your sake. The emperor is not as forgiving as I am.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Greetings, Exalted One. Allow me to introduce myself. I am Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight and friend to Captain Solo. I know that you are powerful, mighty Jabba, and that your anger with Solo must be equally powerful. I seek an audience with Your Greatness to bargain for Solo's life. With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation. As a token of my goodwill, I present to you a gift: these two droids.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: What did he say?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Both are hardworking and will serve you well.

speaker: THREEPIO

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: What could possibly have come over Master Luke. Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work. Oh! Oh! How horrid!

speaker: NINEDENINE
combinedline: Guard! This protocol droid might be useful. Fit him with a restraining bolt and take him back to His Excellency's main audience chamber.

speaker: NINEDENINE
combinedline: You're a feisty little one, but you'll soon learn some respect. I have need for you on the master's Sail Barge. And I think you'll fill in nicely.

combinedline: Who are you?

combinedline: I gotta get you out of here.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way to pay you back, but I got a little sidetracked. It's not my fault.

speaker: JABBA
combinedline: It's too late for that, Solo. You may have been a good smuggler, but now you're Bantha fodder.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Look...

speaker: JABBA
combinedline: Take him away!

combinedline: Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.

speaker: HAN

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You should have bargained, Jabba.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: That's the last mistake you'll ever make.

combinedline: Well, I can see you're serving drinks, but this place is dangerous. They're going to execute Master Luke and, if we're not careful, us too!

combinedline: [beeps]

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Hmm. I wish I had your confidence.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Victims of the almighty Sarlacc: His Excellency hopes that you will die honorably. But should any of you wish to beg for mercy, the great Jabba the Hutt will now listen to your pleas.

speaker: JABBA
combinedline: Tibi Jedi

combinedline: Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us.

speaker: HAN

combinedline: It's all right. I can see a lot better! Don't move.

combinedline: A little higher! Just a little higher!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, Pull us up! Come on! Okay... up, Chewie, up!

combinedline: Come on. We gotta get out of here quick.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Not my eyes! Artoo, help! Quickly, Artoo. Oh! Ohhh! Beast!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Get the gun! Point it at the deck! Point it at the deck!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, where are we going? I couldn't possibly jump.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Come on!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Let's go! And don't forget the droids.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We're on our way.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'll meet you back at the fleet.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Hurry. The Alliance should be assembled by now.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I will.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, Luke, thanks. Thanks for comin' after me. Now I owe you one.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: That's right, Artoo. We're going to the Dagobah system.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I have a promise to keep... to an old friend.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Rise, my friend.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: The Death Star will be completed on schedule.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: You have done well, Lord Vader. And now I sense you wish to continue your search for young Skywalker.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Yes, my Master.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Patience, my friend. In time, he will seek you out. And when he does, you must bring him before me. He has grown strong. Only together can we turn him to the dark side of the Force.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: As you wish.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: That face you make. Look I so old to young eyes?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No, of course not.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: I do. Yes, I do! Sick have I become. Old and weak. When 900 years old you reach, look as good you will not. Hmm? Soon will I rest. Yes. Forever sleep. Earned it, I have.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Master Yoda, you can't die.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Strong am I with the Force, but not that strong! Twilight is upon me, and soon night must fall. That is the way of things... the way of the Force.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But I need your help. I've come back to complete the training.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: No more training do you require. Already know you that which you need.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Then I am a Jedi.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Ohhh. Not yet. One thing remains -- Vader. You must confront Vader. Then, only then, a Jedi will you be. And confront him you will.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Master Yoda... is Darth Vader my father?

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Mmm... rest I need. Yes. Rest.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Yoda, I must know.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Your father he is. Told you, did he?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Yes.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Unexpected this is. And unfortunate.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Unfortunate that I know the truth?

speaker: YODA
combinedline: No. Unfortunate that you rushed to face him, that incomplete was your training, that not ready for the burden were you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'm sorry.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Remember, a Jedi's strength flows from the Force. But beware. Anger, fear, aggression, the dark side are they. Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Luke... Luke... Do not... Do not underestimate the powers of the emperor, or suffer your father's fate, you will. Luke, when gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. Luke, the Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned. Luke... There is... another... Sky...Sky...walker.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I can't do it, Artoo.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I can't go on alone.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Yoda will always be with you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Obi-Wan! Why didn't you tell me? You told me Vader betrayed and murdered my father.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: You father was seduced by the dark side of the Force. He ceased to be Anakin Skywalker and became Darth Vader. When that happened, the good man who was your father was destroyed. So what I have told you was true... from a certain point of view.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: A certain point of view?

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Luke, you're going to find that many of the truths we cling to depend greatly on our own point of view. Anakin was a good friend. When I first knew him, your father was already a great pilot. But I was amazed how strongly the Force was with him. I took it upon myself to train him as a Jedi. I thought that I could instruct him just as well as Yoda. I was wrong.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: There is still good in him.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: He's more machine now than man. Twisted and evil.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I can't do it, Ben.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: You cannot escape your destiny. You must face Darth Vader again!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I can't kill my own father.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Then the Emperor has already won. You were our only hope.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Yoda spoke of another.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: The other he spoke of is your twin sister.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But I have no sister.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Hmm. To protect you both from the emperor, you were hidden from your father when you were born. The emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him. That is the reason why your sister remains safely anonymous.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Leia! Leia's my sister.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Your insight serves you well. Bury your feelings deep down, Luke. They do you credit. But they could be made to serve the emperor.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, look at you, a general, huh?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Oh, well, someone must have told them about my little maneuver at the Battle of Taanab.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, don't look at me, pal. I just said you were a fair pilot. I didn't know they were lookin' for somebody to lead this crazy attack.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I'm surprised they didn't ask you to do it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, who says they didn't. But I ain't crazy. You're the respectable one, remember?

speaker: MON MOTHMA
combinedline: The emperor's made a critical error and the time for our attack has come. The data brought to us by the Bothan spies pinpoints the exact location of the Emperor's new battle station. We also know that the weapon systems of this Death Star are not yet operational. With the Imperial Fleet spread throughout the galaxy in a vain effort to engage us, it is relatively unprotected. But most important of all, we've learned that the emperor himself is personally overseeing the final stages of the construction of this Death Star. Many Bothans died to bring us this information.

speaker: MON MOTHMA
combinedline: Admiral Ackbar, please.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: You can see here the Death Star orbiting the forest moon of Endor. Although the weapon systems on this Death Star are not yet operational, the Death Star does have a strong defense mechanism. It is protected by an energy shield, which is generated from the nearby forest moon of Endor. The shield must be deactivated if any attack is to be attempted. Once the shield is down, our cruisers will create a perimeter, while the fighters fly into the superstructure and attempt to knock out the main reactor. General Calrissian has volunteered to lead the fighter attack.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Good luck. You're gonna need it.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: General Madine.

speaker: GENERAL MADINE
combinedline: We have stolen a small Imperial shuttle. Disguised as a cargo ship, and using a secret Imperial code, a strike team will land on the moon and deactivate the shield generator.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Sounds dangerous.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I wonder who they found to pull that off.

speaker: GENERAL MADINE
combinedline: General Solo, is your strike team assembled?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Uh, my team's ready. I don't have a command crew for the shuttle.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, it's gonna be rough, pal. I didn't want to speak for you.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: That's one.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: General... count me in.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'm with you, too.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What is it?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Ask me again sometime.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Luke.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Hi, Han... Chewie.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: "Exciting" is hardly the word I would use.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Look. I want you to take her. I mean it. Take her. You need all the help you can get. She's the fastest ship in the fleet.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right, old buddy. You know, I know what she means to you. I'll take good care of her. She-she won't get a scratch. All right?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Right. I got your promise now. Not a scratch.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Look, would you get going, you pirate. Good luck.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You, too.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You got her warmed?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Yeah, she's coming up.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, well I don't think the Empire had Wookiees in mind when they designed her, Chewie.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Hey, you awake?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, I just got a funny feeling. Like I'm not gonna see her again.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Come on, General, let's move.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Right.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie...

speaker: HAN
combinedline: ... let's see what this piece of junk can do. Ready, everybody?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: All set.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Here we go again.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: All right, hang on.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: What is thy bidding, my Master?

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Send the fleet to the far side of Endor. There it will stay until called for.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: What of the reports of the Rebel fleet massing near Sullust?

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: It is of no concern. Soon the Rebellion will be crushed and young Skywalker will be one of us. Your work here is finished, my friend. Go out to the command ship and await my orders.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Yes, my Master.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: If they don't go for this, we're gonna have to get outta here pretty quick, Chewie.

speaker: CONTROLLER
combinedline: We have you on our screen now. Please identify.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Shuttle Tydirium requesting deactivation of the deflector shield.

speaker: CONTROLLER
combinedline: Shuttle Tydirium, transmit the clearance code for shield passage.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Transmission commencing.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Now we find out if that code is worth the price we paid.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It'll work. It'll work.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Vader's on that ship.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Now don't get jittery, Luke. There are a lot of command ships.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Keep your distance though, Chewie, but don't look like you're trying to keep your distance.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I don't know. Fly casual.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Where is that shuttle going?

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Shuttle Tydirium, what is your cargo and destination?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Parts and technical crew for the forest moon.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Do they have a code clearance?

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: It's an older code, sir, but it checks out. I was about to clear them.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'm endangering the mission. I shouldn't have come.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It's your imagination, kid. Come on. Let's keep a little optimism here.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Shall I hold them?

speaker: VADER
combinedline: No. Leave them to me. I will deal with them myself.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: As you wish, my lord.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Carry on.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: They're not goin' for it, Chewie.

speaker: CONTROLLER
combinedline: Shuttle Tydirium, deactivation of the shield will commence immediately. Follow your present course.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Okay! I told you it was gonna work. No problem.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, I told you it was dangerous here.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Should we try and go around?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: It'll take time.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: This whole party'll be for nothing if they see us.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie and I will take care of this. You stay here.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Quietly, there might be more of them out there.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey... it's me.

speaker: SCOUT #1
combinedline: Go for help! Go!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Great. Come on.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Over there! Two more of them!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I see them. Wait, Leia!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, wait!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Quick. Jam their comlink. Center switch. Move closer! Get alongside that one! Keep on that one! I'll take these two!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, General Solo, somebody's coming. Oh!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Luke! Where's Leia?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: What? She didn't come back?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I thought she was with you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: We got separated. Hey, we better go look for her.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Take the squad ahead. We'll meet at the shield generator at 0300.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Come on, Artoo. We'll need your scanners.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Don't worry, Master Luke. We know what to do.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: And you said it was pretty here.

speaker: WICKET
combinedline: Eek

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Cut it out!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I'm not gonna hurt you.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Well, looks like I'm stuck here. Trouble is, I don't know where here is. Maybe you can help me. Come on, sit down. I promise I won't hurt you. Now come here. All right. You want something to eat?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: That's right. Come on.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Look. It's a hat. It's not gonna hurt you. Look.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What is it?

speaker: SCOUT #1
combinedline: Freeze! Come on, get up.

speaker: SCOUT #1
combinedline: Go get your ride and take her back to base.

speaker: SCOUT #2
combinedline: Yes, sir.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Come on, let's get outta here.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: I told you to remain on the command ship.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: A small Rebel force has penetrated the shield and landed on Endor.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Yes, I know.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: My son is with them.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Are you sure?

speaker: VADER
combinedline: I have felt him, my master.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Strange that I have not. I wonder if your feelings on this matter are clear, Lord Vader.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: They are clear, my master.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Then you must go to the sanctuary moon and wait for them.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: He will come to me?

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: I have foreseen it. His compassion for you will be his undoing. He will come to you, and then you will bring him before me.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: As you wish.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Luke! Luke!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, Master Luke.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: There's two more wrecked speeders back there. And I found this.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I'm afraid that Artoo's sensors can find no trace of Princess Leia.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I hope she's all right.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What, Chewie?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What, Chewie?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, I don't get it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Nah, it's just a dead animal, Chewie.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Chewie, wa-wait! Don't!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Nice work. Great, Chewie! Great! Always thinking with your stomach.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Will you take it easy? Let's just figure out a way to get out of this thing. Han, can you reach my lightsaber?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, sure.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, I'm not sure that's such a good idea. It's a very long drop!

speaker: R2D2
combinedline: scared

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What--? Hey! Point that thing someplace else. Hey!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Han, don't. It'll be all right.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Chewie, give them your crossbow.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, my head. Oh, my goodness.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Do you understand anything they're saying?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, yes, Master Luke! Remember that I am fluent in over six million forms of communication.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What are you telling them?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Hello, I think... I could be mistaken. They're using a very primitive dialect. But I do believe they think I am some sort of god.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, why don't you use your divine influence and get us out of this?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I beg your pardon, General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Proper?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Why, you--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: My mistake. He's an old friend of mine.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I have a really bad feeling about this.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What did he say?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Leia!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Leia.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Oh!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Your Royal Highness.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: But these are my friends.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Threepio, tell them they must be set free.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Somehow, I got the feeling that didn't help us very much.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: But Master Luke, what magic? I couldn't possibly--

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Just tell them.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: You see, Master Luke; they didn't believe me. Just... as I said they wouldn't.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Wha-wha-what's happening! Oh! Oh, dear! Oh!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Put me down! He-e-elp! Master Luke! Artoo! Somebody, somebody, help! Master Luke, Artoo! Artoo, quickly! Do something, somebody! Oh! Ohhh!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, oh, oh, oh! Thank goodness.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Thanks, Threepio.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I...I never knew I had it in me.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Woochana Makwartas, woochana makawartas. Nervrenda bootootoo Tatooine. Faraway, mana quitoo. Princess Leia wasay wapa R2. Oos batata rundi Darth Vader! Un Chenko baskimo quertonto Death Star. Wos michi un Jedi, Obi-Wan Kenobi. Ee manu machi Vader konyono.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Yes, Artoo. I was just coming to that.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Torron togosh. Master Luke ahchiminie choodoo. Uta Millennium Falcon ahchiminie Cloud City. Oos nooch Vader. Han Solo.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Tiklo carbonite! Un dekochna gooboo Sarlacc. Haonna keenie chetoo toomoo maneta.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What's going on?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I don't know.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Wonderful! We are now a part of the tribe.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Just what I always wanted.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, short help is better than no help at all, Chewie.

speaker: WICKET
combinedline: Ahh eecha womah

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Thank you. Okay.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: He says the scouts are going to show us the quickest way to the shield generator.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Good. How far is it? Ask him. We need some fresh supplies, too. And try and get our weapons back. And hurry up, will ya? I haven't got all day.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke, what's wrong?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Leia, do you remember your mother? Your real mother?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: What do you remember?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Just images, really. Feelings.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Tell me.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: She was very beautiful. Kind, but sad. Why are you asking me this?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Vader is here. Now, on this moon.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: How do you know?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I felt his presence. He's come for me. He can feel when I'm near. That's why I have to go. As long as I stay, I'm endangering the group and our mission here. I have to face him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Why?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: He's my father.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Your father?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: There's more. It won't be easy for you to hear it, but you must. If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I--I don't understand and could never have.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time, you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force is strong in my family. My father has it. I have it. And... my sister has it. Yes. It's you, Leia.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I know. Somehow... I've always known.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Then you know why I have to face him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: No! Luke, run away, far away. If he can feel your presence, then leave this place. I wish I could go with you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No, you don't. You've always been strong.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: But, why must you confront him?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Because... there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, what's goin' on?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Nothing. I - just want to be alone for a little while.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Nothing? Come on, tell me. What's goin' on?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I...I can't tell you.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Could you tell Luke? Is that who you could tell?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I-

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Ah. I'm sorry.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Hold me.

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: This is a rebel that surrendered to us. Although he denies it, I believe there may be more of them and I request permission to conduct a further search of the area. He was armed only with this.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Good work, Commander. Leave us. Conduct your search and bring his companions to me.

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: Yes, my Lord.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: The Emperor has been expecting you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I know, Father.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: So, you have accepted the truth.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I've accepted the truth that you were once Anakin Skywalker, my father.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: That name no longer has any meaning for me.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: It is the name of your true self. You've only forgotten. I know there is good in you. The emperor hasn't driven it from you fully. That was why you couldn't destroy me. That's why you won't bring me to your emperor now.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: I see you have constructed a new lightsaber. Your skills are complete. Indeed you are powerful, as the emperor has foreseen.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Come with me.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Obi-Wan once thought as you do. You don't know the power of the dark side. I must obey my master.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I will not turn, and you'll be forced to kill me.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: If that is your destiny.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Search your feelings, Father. You can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: It is too late for me, son. The emperor will show you the true nature of the Force. He is your master now.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Then my father is truly dead.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: The main entrance to the control bunker's on the far side of that landing platform. This isn't gonna be easy.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, don't worry. Chewie and me got into a lot of places more heavily guarded than this.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What's he saying?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: He says there's a secret entrance on the other side of the ridge.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Admiral, we're in position. All fighters accounted for.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: Proceed with the countdown. All groups assume attack coordinates.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Don't worry, my friends down there. They'll have that shield down on time.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Or this'll be the shortest offensive of all time.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: All craft, prepare to jump to hyperspace on my mark.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right. Stand by.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Back door, huh? Good idea.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It's only a few guards. This shouldn't be too much trouble.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: It only takes one to sound the alarm.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Then we'll do it real quiet like.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh! Oh, my. Uh, Princess Leia! I'm afraid our furry companion has gone and done something rather rash.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Oh, no.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: There goes our surprise attack.

speaker: SCOUT
combinedline: Look! Over there! Stop him!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Not bad for a little furball. There's only one left.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You stay here. We'll take care of this.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I have decided that we shall stay here.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Welcome, young Skywalker. I have been expecting you. You no longer need those.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Guards, leave us.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: I'm looking forward to completing your training. In time, you will call me master.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me as you did my father.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Oh, no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken... about a great many things.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: His lightsaber.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Ah, yes. A Jedi's weapon. Much like your father's. By now you must know your father can never be turned from the dark side. So will it be with you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You're wrong. Soon I'll be dead, and you with me.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Perhaps you refer to the imminent attack of your Rebel fleet. Yes, I assure you we are quite safe from your friends here.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Your overconfidence is your weakness.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Your faith in your friends is yours.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: It is pointless to resist, my son.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Everything that has transpired has done so according to my design. Your friends up there on the sanctuary moon are walking into a trap. As is your Rebel fleet. It was I who allowed the Alliance to know the location of the shield generator. It is quite safe from your pitiful little band. An entire legion of my best troops awaits them.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Oh... I'm afraid the deflector shield will be quite operational when your friends arrive.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: All right! Up! Move! Come on! Quickly! Quickly.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Charges! Come on, come on!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, my! They'll be captured!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Wa-wait! Wait, come back! Artoo, stay with me.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: R2, stay with me!

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: Freeze! You Rebel scum.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All wings report in.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Red Leader standing by.

speaker: GRAY LEADER
combinedline: Gray Leader standing by.

speaker: GREEN LEADER
combinedline: Green Leader standing by.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Lock S-foils in attack positions.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: May the Force be with us.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We've got to be able to get some kind of a reading on that shield, up or down.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Well, how could they be jamming us if they don't know if we're coming.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Break off the attack! The shield is still up.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: I get no reading. Are you sure?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Pull up! All craft pull up!

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: Take evasive action! Green Group, stick close to holding sector MV-7.

speaker: CONTROLLER
combinedline: Admiral, we have enemy ships in sector 47.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: It's a trap!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Fighters coming in.

speaker: REBEL PILOT
combinedline: There's too many of them!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Accelerate to attack speed! Draw their fire away from the cruisers.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Copy, Gold Leader.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Come, boy. See for yourself. From here you will witness the final destruction of the Alliance, and the end of your insignificant Rebellion. You want this, don't you? The hate is swelling in you now. Take your Jedi weapon. Use it. I am unarmed. Strike me down with it. Give in to your anger. With each passing moment, you make yourself more my servant.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: It is unavoidable. It is your destiny. You, like your father, are now mine!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: All right, move it! Keep moving, go on!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Hello! I say, over there! Were you looking for me?

speaker: BUNKER COMMANDER
combinedline: Bring those two down here!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Let's go!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Well, they're on their way. Artoo, are you sure this was a good idea?

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Freeze! Don't move!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: We surrender.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: The code's changed. We need Artoo!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Here's the terminal.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Artoo, where are you? We need you at the bunker right away.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Going? What do you mean, you're going. But-- but going where, Artoo?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: No, wait! Artoo! Oh, this is no time for heroics. Come back!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Watch yourself, Wedge! Three from above!

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Red Three, Red Two, pull in!

speaker: RED TWO
combinedline: Got it!

speaker: RED THREE
combinedline: Three of them coming in, twenty degrees!

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Cut to the left! I'll take the leader! They're heading for the medical frigate.

speaker: NAVIGATOR
combinedline: Pressure steady.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Only the fighters are attacking. I wonder what those Star Destroyers are waiting for.

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: We're in attack position now, sir.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Hold here.

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: We're not going to attack?

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: I have my orders from the emperor himself. He has something special planned for them. We only need to keep them from escaping.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: As you can see, my young apprentice, your friends have failed. Now witness the firepower of this fully armed and operational battle station.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Fire at will, Commander.

speaker: JERJERROD
combinedline: Fire!

speaker: NIEN NUNB
combinedline: Oh!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: That blast came from the Death Star! That thing's operational!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Home One, this is Gold Leader.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: We saw it. All craft prepare to retreat.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You won't get another chance at this, Admiral.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: We have no choice, General Calrissian. Our cruisers can't repel firepower of that magnitude.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Han will have that shield down. We've got to give him more time.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: We're coming!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Come on! Come on!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, Artoo, hurry!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: My goodness!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, why did you have to be so brave?

speaker: R2D2
combinedline: (fried)

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, I suppose I could hotwire this thing.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I'll cover you.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Yes! I said closer! Move as close as you can and engage those Star Destroyers at point-blank range.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: At that close range, we won't last long against those Star Destroyers.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We'll last longer then we will against that Death Star. And we might just take a few of them with us.

speaker: REBEL PILOT
combinedline: She's gonna blow!

speaker: Y-WING PILOT
combinedline: I'm hit!

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Your fleet is lost, and your friends on the Endor moon will not survive. There is no escape, my young apprentice. The Alliance will die... as will your friends. Good. I can feel your anger. I am defenseless. Take your weapon! Strike me down with all of your hatred, and your journey towards the dark side will be complete.

speaker: WALKER PILOT #1
combinedline: Look!

speaker: PILOT #2
combinedline: Get him off of there!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I think I got it. I got it!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, Princess Leia, are you all right?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Let's see.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: It's not bad.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Freeze!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, dear.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Don't move!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I love you.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I know.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Hands up! Stand up!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Stay back.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Get down here! She's wounded! No, wait...

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I got an idea.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Good. Use your aggressive feelings, boy! Let the hate flow through you.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Obi-Wan has taught you well.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I will not fight you, father.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You are unwise to lower your defenses.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Your thoughts betray you, father. I feel the good in you... the conflict.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: There is no conflict.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before, and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You underestimate the power of the dark side. If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Good. Good.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Watch out. Squad at .06.

speaker: REBEL PILOT
combinedline: I'm on it, Gold Leader.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Good shot, Red Two.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We're sure in the middle of it now...

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Come on, Han, old buddy. Don't let me down.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It's over, Commander. The Rebels have been routed. They're fleeing into the woods. We need reinforcements to continue the pursuit.

speaker: CONTROL ROOM COMMANDER
combinedline: Send three squads to help. Open the back door.

speaker: SECOND COMMANDER
combinedline: Yes, sir.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Throw me another charge.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You cannot hide forever, Luke.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I will not fight you.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends. Yes, your thoughts betray you. Your feelings for them are strong. Especially for... Sister! So... you have a twin sister. Your feelings have now betrayed her, too. Obi-Wan was wise to hide her from me. Now his failure is complete. If you will not turn to the dark side, then perhaps she will.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Never!

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Good! Your hate has made you powerful. Now, fulfill your destiny and take your father's place at my side!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Never. I'll never turn to the dark side. You've failed, Your Highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: So be it... Jedi.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Move! Move!

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: The shield is down! Commence attack on the Death Star's main reactor.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We're on our way. Red Group, Gold Group, all fighters follow me.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Told you they'd do it!

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: If you will not be turned, you will be destroyed. Young fool. Only now, at the end, do you understand. Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side. You have paid the price for your lack of vision.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Father, please. Help me.

speaker: PALPATINE
combinedline: Now, young Skywalker... you will die.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: No. No!

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: I'm going in.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Here goes nothing. Now lock onto the strongest power source. It should be the power generator.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Form up. And stay alert. We could run out of space real fast.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Split up and head back to the surface. See if you can get a few of those TIE fighters to follow you.

speaker: PILOT
combinedline: Copy, Gold Leader.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: That was too close.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: We've got to give those fighters more time. Concentrate all fire on that Super Star Destroyer.

speaker: CONTROLLER
combinedline: Sir, we've lost our bridge deflector shield.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Intensify the forward batteries. I don't want anything to get through. Intensify forward firepower!

speaker: COMMANDER
combinedline: It's too late!

speaker: ANAKIN
combinedline: Luke. Help me take this mask off.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But you'll die.

speaker: ANAKIN
combinedline: Nothing can stop that now. Just for once... let me look on you with my own eyes.

speaker: ANAKIN
combinedline: Now... go, my son. Leave me.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No. You're coming with me. I'll leave you here. I've got to save you.

speaker: ANAKIN
combinedline: You already have, Luke. You were right. You were right about me. Tell your sister... you were right.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Father... I won't leave you.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: There it is!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right, Wedge. Go for the power regulator on the north tower.

speaker: WEDGE
combinedline: Copy, Gold Leader. I'm already on my way out.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: Move the fleet away from the Death Star.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: They did it!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I'm sure Luke wasn't on that thing when it blew.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: He wasn't. I can feel it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You love him. Don't you?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Yes.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: All right. I understand. Fine. When he comes back, I won't get in the way.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: No, it's not like that at all. He's my brother.
